definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: Users of popular Twitter-like microblogging service Sina Weibo were likewise disbelieving.
sentences.chinese: 新浪微博的用户也同样不相信这个裁定结果。

sentences.english: You read hundreds of emails and thousands of tweets every day. But how many handwritten letters do you receive?
sentences.chinese: 想想看，你一天可以阅读数百封邮件，数千篇微博。

sentences.english: Zhai is one of hundreds of millions of micro blog users in China.
sentences.chinese: 翟浪伟是中国数亿微博用户之一。

sentences.english: Blame has flown on Chinese websites such as the popular microblogging site Weibo.
sentences.chinese: 在中国流行的微博等网站上，人们不断提出指责。

sentences.english: Weibo subscribers are not only reading news, they're also reporting on it.
sentences.chinese: 微博用户不仅是阅读新闻，他们也有报道。

sentences.english: But right now, the situation is changing. Weibo has conquered the dominant position in shaping public opinion.
sentences.chinese: 但现在，情况正在改变，微博成为新的舆论引导者。

sentences.english: By continually posting comments, fans can help increase the popularity of their favorite stars' micro-blogs.
sentences.chinese: 发表评论，粉丝们能帮助喜爱的明星微博的热度。

sentences.english: Mr Lee spends about one-and-a-half hours a day updating his own microblog.
sentences.chinese: 李先生每天用一个半小时左右的时间来更新他的微博。

sentences.english: When there are enough followers, microblog start to sell things.
sentences.chinese: 当有了足够的用户，微博就开始推销东西。

sentences.english: Tens of millions of weibo posts are created and reposted each day in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，每天产生数以千万计原创或转发的微博帖子。

sentences.english: And they sent a tweet directly from the heavens on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 他们周五的时候还直接从天空发来了微博呢。

sentences.english: It's known that the micro blog and friends circle are quite popular in China.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，微博和朋友圈在中国广受欢迎。

sentences.english: One reason is that Weibo doesn’t have any revenue yet.
sentences.chinese: 一个原因是微博目前还没有任何收益。

sentences.english: The microblogs, or weibos, are perhaps the prime example.
sentences.chinese: 微型博客，又称微博，也许是主要例子。

sentences.english: Radiohead recently launched a page on the "weibo" site of leading Chinese Internet portal Sina.com.
sentences.chinese: 日前在中国的门户网站新浪网开通了“微博”。

sentences.english: The evolution of microblogs has raised some alarm over the direction of this platform.
sentences.chinese: 微博的演变也对此平台引起了一些担忧。
